About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

FrontEnd / Web Developer with 5 years of experience currently working at Juniper Networks, Bangalore. Prior to which I have worked at Sapient Global Markets and SAP Labs India as a Web developer. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript; plus modern Javascript libraries and frameworks.

Sapient (Global Markets)

Web Developer

Developed a web platform for medium and small scale customers and provide them with reporting with the trade transactions.

SAP Labs India

Front End Developer

Fiori Generic Templates is a library that helps developers to create application with respect to the guidelines laid out by SAP for delivering client applications which provides ERP solution. It provides as the name suggest a generic template with customizable components for the app developers. The template provides key functionalities like analytics, cataloguing and IoT capabilities.

Juniper Networks

Front End Developer

The J-Web interface allows you to monitor, configure, troubleshoot, and manage the routing platform by means of a Web browser. J-Web provides access to all the configuration statements supported by the routing platform, so you can fully configure it without using the Junos OS CLI.
